name: Final Descent (Hafrold)
description:
This game is a simple text-adventure which places you as a pilot of your own plane flying across the Atlantic Ocean! Discover your own (demo) fate today!

This project is for Section 3 of the Udemy Course "Complete C# Unity Developer 2D: Learn to Code Making Games" by Gamedev.tv. The course can be found at https://www.udemy.com/course/unitycourse/.

Note: The current storyline is a demo concept which may be continued in the future, thus the current project is a prototype and may be incomplete. Missing functionality will be updated (such as no ability to quit the game with ESC) once I reach that part of the course.
